name: Train Door System
description: The train door system is  responsible for the opening and closing of the carriage doors.

name: Insulin Pump
description: The Insulin Pump System is a medical device designed to administer insulin.

name: UATM
description: UATM is a system under development to manage urban air vehicle traffic.

name: Nuclear Power Plant
description: A nuclear power plant harnesses the energy from splitting uranium atoms to generate electricity safely and efficiently.
